name: WARMA
description: WARMA - this is the first experimental project that combines a variety of genres, developing in the direction of role-playing games, built on the basis of custom multiplayer.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Dual-Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 640 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 360  2GB Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: IntelCore i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
